feed.title: WatchState Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250405-ef0c91a8
entry.content:
• 608473f1 backend:create when renaming user make sure to update it early to propagate for the rest of the code by arabcoders
  • 6d8dfd4b in backend:create, cast user names to string, sometimes we get integers by arabcoders
  • eece04ce minor fixes by arabcoders
  • 23f96575 Fixed FAQ formatting by arabcoders
  • 45017b24 update mapper.yaml spec by arabcoders
  • ad2f7b38 Mostly WebUI changes to make easier to filter stuff by arabcoders

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250307-200d6a48...master-20250405-ef0c91a8

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250408-1446ce7f
entry.content:
• 0feba245 Enhance name normalization and validation with logging and additional tests by arabcoders
  • 0c58c283 css style update by arabcoders
  • 42c3c81f minor design update & fix markdown pages display by arabcoders
  • dc822771 make the log view console a bit more darker by arabcoders
  • 0563d1f7 improve log view experience by arabcoders
  • 8213b992 Fix Incorrectly nested style tag found. error by arabcoders
  • d0ea7c76 Fix minor typo by arabcoders
  • a2ad6170 Completely re-worked how backend:create command works by arabcoders
  • 7951ee63 fixed bug that prevents run_task from actually running by arabcoders

What's Changed

  • semi self-plug for YTPTube project. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/623
  • Support jellyfin & Emby boxSets by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/626
  • Minor WebUI design update to include random background by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/630
  • QoL improvements by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/633
  • Update mapper.yaml spec by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/635
  • fixed bug that prevents run_task from actually running by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/637
  • Re-worked how we generate sub-users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/639
  • Fix minor typo by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/640
  • Enhance name normalization and validation with logging by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/642

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250307-200d6a48...master-20250408-1446ce7f

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250408-7cd543dc
entry.content:
• c15050ef Added new API endpoint to validate plex token and a webpage to support it by arabcoders
  • 4f687295 minor webui changes by arabcoders
  • d5e4d297 Make possible again to get raw response from plex api for getUsersList. Add new command to check validity of plex token by arabcoders

What's Changed

  • semi self-plug for YTPTube project. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/623
  • Support jellyfin & Emby boxSets by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/626
  • Minor WebUI design update to include random background by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/630
  • QoL improvements by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/633
  • Update mapper.yaml spec by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/635
  • fixed bug that prevents run_task from actually running by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/637
  • Re-worked how we generate sub-users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/639
  • Fix minor typo by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/640
  • Enhance name normalization and validation with logging by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/642
  • Introduced a new page for validating Plex Tokens by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/643

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250307-200d6a48...master-20250408-7cd543dc

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250411-54c66ee2
entry.content:
• 748c8bb3 Switch to DirectMapper as default mapper for import operations and deprecate MemoryMapper by arabcoders
  • 9ff5255a Split utils from helpers as the file was getting big by arabcoders
  • 859b56ab move common logic to a helper functions for WebUI by arabcoders
  • 3ed2c9b9 update external dependancies by arabcoders
  • 9e9dfb48 major update to sub-users creation by arabcoders
  • 869d4814 update gitignore by arabcoders
  • 85b2476c sub users webui feature by arabcoders
  • e50bf866 Fixed #644 by arabcoders

What's Changed

  • semi self-plug for YTPTube project. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/623
  • Support jellyfin & Emby boxSets by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/626
  • Minor WebUI design update to include random background by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/630
  • QoL improvements by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/633
  • Update mapper.yaml spec by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/635
  • fixed bug that prevents run_task from actually running by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/637
  • Re-worked how we generate sub-users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/639
  • Fix minor typo by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/640
  • Enhance name normalization and validation with logging by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/642
  • Introduced a new page for validating Plex Tokens by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/643
  • Fix makedate call when the added_at is null by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/645
  • Added more user friendly way to generate sub-users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/646
  • Switch to DirectMapper as default mapper for import operations by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/647

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250307-200d6a48...master-20250411-54c66ee2

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250413-3e69758c
entry.content:
• 0b38e13b Import content genres by arabcoders
  • 7951ad16 Added a remote logging handler to allow user to forward logs to remote target. by arabcoders
  • 7a2c5e01 expand the imported data to include the content summary by arabcoders

What's Changed

  • semi self-plug for YTPTube project. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/623
  • Support jellyfin & Emby boxSets by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/626
  • Minor WebUI design update to include random background by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/630
  • QoL improvements by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/633
  • Update mapper.yaml spec by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/635
  • fixed bug that prevents run_task from actually running by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/637
  • Re-worked how we generate sub-users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/639
  • Fix minor typo by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/640
  • Enhance name normalization and validation with logging by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/642
  • Introduced a new page for validating Plex Tokens by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/643
  • Fix makedate call when the added_at is null by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/645
  • Added more user friendly way to generate sub-users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/646
  • Switch to DirectMapper as default mapper for import operations by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/647
  • Improvements to logging & import content summary/genres by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/648

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250307-200d6a48...master-20250413-3e69758c
